text: found another annoying bug which exists in 2.8 but not 2.9 ... would be very grateful if anyone had a workaround
if you use the `component` helper to generate a tagless component
and try to set the 'id' property in the template (aka, `{{component 'my-component' id='123'}}`) it will error out saying that you can't set the `elementId` for a tagless component
not sure why it mixes `id` for `elementId` but it does in 2.8.1

attachments.title: [BUGFIX release] Avoid assertion when bound `id` provided to tagless component by HeroicEric · Pull Request #14382 · emberjs/ember.js · GitHub
